name: Flutter - Advanced Course
author: Bryan Cairns
description: Bryan has a few courses available on Udemy, specifically his course on Qt 5 Design Patterns and also has a popular group on Facebook which helps others with their Qt questions as well. For his work alone in creating the Qt 5 training course online for everyone to benefit from it was easy to make him our year's Content Creator.

name: Flutter with Firebase
author: Dhruvil Patel
description: Hi there, I am an Instructor. I have experience in the in-person training.I do Mobile Development, Web Development, and Backend Development.I have the expertise to make the hardest topic to the Easiest method.
